item.title: GMS Inc 10-K
item.description: GMS Inc, which is in the Wholesale-Lumber & Other Construction Materials [5030] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 23, 2022 had 29457 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 333 instances 30 - 284 instances april - 275 instances financial - 257 instances 2022 - 255 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
